title: Roasted Potato Wedges
instructions: Peel the potatoes and cut them into ½-inch-thick wedges.  In a small roasting pan toss the potatoes with the oil and salt and roast them in the oven until golden and crisp, about 45 minutes.
Source:  The Best of Gourmet 2000, from the Editors of Gourmet, ©1999 by The Condé Nast Publications, Published by Random House Inc., New York.
